blocks.name: eirrlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ eirr . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eirrlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  syl112anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, nat1))), clt, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, c2))), wbr(co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(cfv(cfa, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, c2))))), wcel(co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, c2)), cr), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cfv(cfa, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  nnred(co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1), w0)

  ltmuldiv2d(cfv(cfa, c2), csu(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), nat1, w0)

  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cn0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: eirr
blocks.content: ` _e ` is irrational. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eirr() {
  |- wnel(ceu, cq)
} = {
  nelir(ceu, cq)
  mtbir(wcel(ceu, cq), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))))
  nrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))))
  nrexdv(hs1, cn, wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  imnani(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  eirrlem(hs2, cmpt(hs2, cn0, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs2, cn0, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))))
  simpll(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  simplr(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  simpr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(ceu, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))
  elq(hs0, hs1, ceu)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ceu)
  diff.hs1.c(ceu)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eirr() {
  ⊢ e ∉ ℚ
} = {
  nelir(ceu, cq)
  mtbir(e ∈ ℚ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, e =(hs0[÷]hs1))))
  nrex(hs0, cz, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, e =(hs0[÷]hs1)))
  nrexdv(hs1, cn, hs0 ∈ ℤ, e =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  imnani((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), e =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  eirrlem(hs2, (hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(1[÷](! ` hs2))), hs0, hs1, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ e =(hs0[÷]hs1)))
  eqid((hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(1[÷](! ` hs2))))
  simpll(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, e =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  simplr(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, e =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  simpr((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), e =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  elq(hs0, hs1, ceu)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ceu)
  diff.hs1.c(ceu)
}

blocks.name: egt2lt3
blocks.content: Euler's constant ` _e ` = 2.71828... is bounded by 2 and 3. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm egt2lt3() {
  |- wa(wbr(nat2, clt, ceu), wbr(ceu, clt, nat3))
} = {
  pm3.2i(wbr(nat2, clt, ceu), wbr(ceu, clt, nat3))
  mpbir2an(wbr(nat2, clt, ceu), wbr(nat2, cle, ceu), wne(ceu, nat2))
  simpli(wbr(nat2, cle, ceu), wbr(ceu, cle, nat3))
  ax-mp(wne(ceu, nat2), wn(wcel(ceu, cn)))
  necon3bi(ceu, nat2, wcel(ceu, cn))
  mpbiri(wceq(ceu, nat2), wcel(ceu, cn), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  eleq1(ceu, nat2, cn)
  ltleni(nat2, ceu)
  2re()
  mpbir2an(wbr(ceu, clt, nat3), wbr(ceu, cle, nat3), wne(nat3, ceu))
  simpri(wbr(ceu, cle, nat3), wbr(nat2, cle, ceu))
  ege2le3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))))
  ax-mp(wne(nat3, ceu), wn(wcel(ceu, cn)))
  mto(wcel(ceu, cn), wcel(ceu, cq))
  neli(ceu, cq)
  eirr()
  nnq(ceu)
  necon3bi(nat3, ceu, wcel(ceu, cn))
  mpbii(wceq(nat3, ceu), wcel(ceu, cn), wcel(nat3, cn))
  3nn()
  eleq1(nat3, ceu, cn)
  ltleni(ceu, nat3)
  ere()
  3re()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm egt2lt3() {
  ⊢ (2[<]e ∧ e[<]3)
} = {
  pm3.2i(2[<]e, e[<]3)
  mpbir2an(2[<]e, 2[≤]e, e ≠ 2)
  simpli(2[≤]e, e[≤]3)
  ax-mp(e ≠ 2, ¬ e ∈ ℕ)
  necon3bi(ceu, nat2, e ∈ ℕ)
  mpbiri(e = 2, e ∈ ℕ, 2 ∈ ℕ)
  2nn()
  eleq1(ceu, nat2, cn)
  ltleni(nat2, ceu)
  2re()
  mpbir2an(e[<]3, e[≤]3, 3 ≠ e)
  simpri(e[≤]3, 2[≤]e)
  ege2le3(hs0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[×]((1[÷]2)[^]hs0))), (hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(1[÷](! ` hs0))))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[×]((1[÷]2)[^]hs0))))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(1[÷](! ` hs0))))
  ax-mp(3 ≠ e, ¬ e ∈ ℕ)
  mto(e ∈ ℕ, e ∈ ℚ)
  neli(ceu, cq)
  eirr()
  nnq(ceu)
  necon3bi(nat3, ceu, e ∈ ℕ)
  mpbii(3 = e, e ∈ ℕ, 3 ∈ ℕ)
  3nn()
  eleq1(nat3, ceu, cn)
  ltleni(ceu, nat3)
  ere()
  3re()
}

blocks.name: epos
blocks.content: Euler's constant ` _e ` is greater than 0. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Nov-2008.)

blocks.name: epr
blocks.content: Euler's constant ` _e ` is a positive real. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Nov-2008.)

blocks.name: ene0
blocks.content: ` _e ` is not 0. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: ene1
blocks.content: ` _e ` is not 1. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Oct-2017.)
